attributes.action: stop the tagging in our hospital's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this petition is to try to stop the tagging as Will nothing stop the impersonal, cold treatment of our fellow men and women. Tag's are used to identify the dead and livestock.
what happened to  good nursing care should involve some sort relationship with the patent!
Do you want to know the actual truth about this? Pin back your ears ... it is connected to the govt wanting to know how much YOU cost to look after (remember, once you are bar coded, all time spent on you, bed days occupied by you, theatre time used by you, drugs used by you etc etc) can be 'charged' to your barcode). It's called 'patient level costing' and no-one except a select few seem to know about it.
